sentences.sentence: The research of iron system flocculate belongs to the forward position of flocculation science.
sentences.translation: 研究高效低耗、安全无害的铁系复合絮凝剂属于絮凝科学领域的研究前沿之一。

sentences.sentence: Two cationic flocculants were used to flocculate the feed suspension prior to microfiltration using hollow fiber membranes.
sentences.translation: 先采用两种阳离子絮凝剂来絮凝进料悬浮物，然后进行中空纤维膜过滤。

sentences.sentence: The relationships between filamentous organisms and flocculate structure in the activated sludge were studied in this paper.
sentences.translation: 通过试验和观察，研究了活性污泥中丝状菌与絮体结构的关系。
